TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Orc Lord - you must try again.
The Elders of Dhun-Kor are grateful for your help. They reward you with much gold and a Dwarven Axe.
You must travel to the 4 Orc villages east of Dhun-Kor and defeat their leaders.
You have defeated one Orc Lord. Three more remain in the villages east of Dhun-Khor.
You have defeated two Orc Lords. Two more remain in the villages east of Dhun-Kor.
You have defeated three Orc Lords. Only one remains in a village east of Dhun-Khor.
You must report your success to the elders of Dhun-Kor.
